plays.text: Penalty to Dmitri Bykov 2 minutes for Tripping Jarkko Ruutu
Penalty to Todd Bertuzzi 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Chelios
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Ed Jovanovski
Penalty to Ed Jovanovski 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Brendan Shanahan
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Todd Bertuzzi
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brett Hull and Igor Larionov
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Pavel Datsyuk 2 minutes for Interference Trent Klatt
Penalty to Trevor Linden 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Trevor Linden
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Igor Larionov and Kris Draper
Goal scored by Trevor Linden assisted by Henrik Sedin and Daniel Sedin
Penalty to Dmitri Bykov 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Sedin
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Tripping Todd Bertuzzi
Goal scored by Trent Klatt assisted by Matt Cooke and Brendan Morrison
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Markus Naslund
Goal scored by Markus Naslund assisted by Mattias Ohlund and Trevor Linden
Goal scored by Marek Malik assisted by Brendan Morrison and Trevor Linden
